ComicInfo.Summary:
The critically acclaimed super-spy story Black Tide relaunches at Avatar in a new on-going series with continuing art by Mike (Superman) Miller! As operatives of a Special Ops unit called Deceivers, super-terrorists and wanted criminals were no match for them. Now, as unseen evil works against them and dangerous enemies resurface, three conflicted heroes must choose sides in a fight for their lives. A Black Ops mission turns out to be a trap when one operative is exposed to a deadly bio-chemical agent. While our three heroes face an evil new opponent who uses their fears against them, two other villains have conspired to destroy them. This special edition is limited to 1500 copies.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-24 21:12:20. [Issue ID 275170]
